items.sentence: Since he was feeling sick, he stayed home from school.
Some parents refuse to have their children vaccinated.
Tom told me that he doesn\'t have a problem with that.
I do a lot of stuff that my mother doesn\'t know I do.
I just told Tom he doesn\'t have to help me on Monday.
Tom justified his conduct by saying he was very upset.
Tom leaves his dirty clothes lying all over the house.
Tom lived in Boston for three years when he was a kid.
Tom lives in the same apartment building as Mary does.
Tom needs to be told that he doesn\'t need to do that.
